price: តើពួកគេត្រូវបានគេបង្កើតដោយគ្មានអ្នកបង្កើតឬ? ឬ មួយពួកគេជាអ្នកដែលបង្កើតខ្លួនឯង ?
arabic: أَمۡ خُلِقُواْ مِنۡ غَيۡرِ شَيۡءٍ أَمۡ هُمُ ٱلۡخَٰلِقُونَ

version.title: Khmer translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Khmer, published by Development Society of Muslim Cambodian Society. The second edition was issued in 2012.

meta.transliteration: am khuliqū min ghayri shayin am humu al-khāliqūna
